job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description: the companyltbrgtltbrgtmiso robotics is transforming the restaurant industry and making a real impact on the worldltbrgtltbrgtmiso robotics is writing an epic new story for the restaurant industry weve developed a robotic kitchen assistant flippy that can perform a variety of kitchen tasks including flipping burgers and running the deep fryer our product is a robotic arm on a rail that fits into existing kitchens along existing cook lines and is designed to work with existing equipment alongside kitchen workers under the hood flippy relies on our platform which combines deep learning and other computer vision technologies with optimizationbased scheduling and nonlinear control to adapt quickly to a variety of kitchen workflows while achieving graceful and efficient motionltbrgtltbrgtthe challenge of bringing robotics into commercial kitchens requires many disciplines to come together the compositions of teams at miso robotics reflect this multidisciplinary nature of our work we have built a worldclass team and we are looking for more exceptional people to join us if you believe like we do that the future of the kitchen involves robotics and artificial intelligence hint it definitely does and if you want to count yourself among the handful of lucky people whove found themselves with the opportunity to solve this problem then miso robotics might be the right place for youltbrgtltbrgtthe roleltbrgtltbrgtas a senior software engineer you will be responsible for designing and developing our kitchen automation framework and cloudconnected infrastructure which power our latest product cookright if you enjoy coding debugging testing and troubleshooting throughout the development process the sr software engineer role is the right role for you this is a great opportunity for you to use your expertise in software engineering to own the design prototype and commercialization of core software for cookright you will work closely with robotics specialists in controls machine learning and computer vision to continuously evolve our architecture to support an everincreasing diversity of kitchen environments and tasks allowing cookright to operate broadly throughout the restaurant industry you will also work to make our internal framework easier and easier to use requiring less and less training to useltbrgtltbrgtwhat youll doltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtin this role you willltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligttake ownership when developing maintaining improving testing and releasing softwareltligtltligtcreate architectural diagrams which demonstrate flow of data through the systemltligtltligtprovide guidance and support within the software development organizationltligtltligtdesign and develop software systems that are highly scalable and testableltligtltligtuse best engineering judgement to iterate on code refactoring repeatedly to improve our software generality and qualityltligtltligtread our code and documentation to understand our existing architecture and practicesltligtltligtreduce algorithmic complexity to improve performanceltligtltligtadhere to and help improve our software development lifecycle sdlc processesltligtltligtcreate documentation to help identify and clarify architectural functional requirementsltligtltligtparticipate in design review and provide helpful feedbackltligtltligtcreate unit tests and systemlevel tests to verify code functionalityltligtltligtcoordinate with hardware engineers and other staff to forecast whether the design will be feasible under cost and time constraintsltligtltligtperforms other related duties as assignedltbrgtltligtltulgtwhat you need in order to succeed in this roleltbrgtltbrgttechnical requirementsltbrgtltulgtltligtbachelors degree in computer science engineering mathematics or related field advanced degree preferredltligtltligt years experience in developing general software frameworks in c including expert knowledge of template metaprogramming stl and concurrencyltligtltligtcompleted at least two complete sdlc of software releases to the commercial marketltligtltligtexperience in realtime system software network stacks and protocolsltligtltligtexperience developing testing and debugging with simulations and complex state machines eg commercial video game developmentltligtltligtexpertise in linux ros cmake git docker and databasesltligtltligtstrong understanding of oop algorithms and data structures and software design patternsltligtltligtexperience with practices for a sdlc including agile development coding standards versioning code reviews and testingltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtpreferred requirementsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtstrong problem solving capabilityltligtltligtsuperb communication skillsltligtltligtability to collaborate effectively with a teamltligtltligtwillingness to read the documentation and do the research to create the highest quality solutionltligtltligtability to adapt your coding style to our internal styleltligtltligtability to deliver productionready code in a timely fashionltligtltligtgreat at managing multiple tasks and getting stuff done in a fast paced environmentltligtltligtstrong attention to detail analytical skills and ability to learn at hyper speedltligtltligtobsession with clarityltligtltligtprolonged periods sitting at a desk and working on a computerltligtltulgt
